metadata.title: CVE-2024-50339 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 9.5.0 and prior to version 10.0.17, an unauthenticated user canretrieve all the sessions IDs and use them to steal any valid session.Version 10.0.17 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
